item.title: [tsr] Mystical Teachings
item.description:
Instant

Search your library for an instant card or a card with flash, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

Flashback {5}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [tsr] Careful Consideration
item.description:
Instant

Target player draws four cards, then discards three cards. If you cast this spell during your main phase, instead that player draws four cards, then discards two cards.

item.title: [tsr] Baral, Chief of Compliance
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

item.title: [tsr] Temporal Isolation
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature has shadow. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

Prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.

https://www.facebook.com/MagicTheGathering.apac/photos/pb.681035948631936.-2207520000../3753933681342132/

item.title: [tsr] Delay
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell. If the spell is countered this way, exile it with three time counters on it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, the player plays it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

https://www.numerama.com/pop-culture/689124-spirale-temporelle-remastered-3-cartes-exclusives-de-la-prochaine-extension-de-magic.html

item.title: [tsr] Draining Whelk
item.description:
Creature — Illusion

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Flying

item.title: [tsr] Aeon Chronicler
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

Aeon Chronicler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.

Suspend X—{X}{3}{U}. X can't be 0. (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {X}{3}{U} and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

Whenever a time counter is removed from Aeon Chronicler while it's exiled, draw a card.

https://twitter.com/pvnova/status/1365238165922078720

item.title: [tsr] Snapback
item.description:
Instant

Return target creature to its owner's hand.

item.title: [tsr] Vesuvan Shapeshifter
item.description:
Creature — Shapeshifter

As Vesuvan Shapeshifter enters the battlefield or is turned face up, you may choose another creature on the battlefield. If you do, until Vesuvan Shapeshifter is turned face down, it becomes a copy of that creature, except it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may turn this creature face down."

Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

item.title: [tsr] Restore Balance
item.description:
Sorcery

Suspend 6—{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {W} and exile it with six time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players sacrifice creatures and discard cards the same way.
